name: Trains Mission
description:
In this 80's themed puzzle you must help Clarence find his stop in the worst subway ever built. Help Clarence get to work in good time by telling him which trains to get on and which stops to get off in this procedurally generated subway system.

Game-Play Instructions:

Use the arrow keys to navigate the main menu and press enter to select. 

WASD or mouse to move camera around.

Spacebar to get on and off trains.

Escape to pause game.

Contribution Credits:

Molly McCarthy (www.linkedin.com/in/molly-mccarthy-615a51152) – Models and Texturing
Steven Kirk – Main Menu Image and Scripts in Assets/Scripts/UI/MainMenu
Marma (www.marmamusic.com/) – Music (Sourced from Unity Asset Store)
